verbose_text: In addition to its ability to degrade IRF3 (see above), the rotavirus NSP1 protein also mediates the ubiquitination and degradation of the cellular E3 Ub ligase F-box protein beta-transducin repeating containing protein (betaTrCP), which regulates NF-kappaB activation via the degradation of the NF-kappaB inhibitor IkappaB.
evidence: NSP1 protein also mediates the ubiquitination and degradation of the cellular E3 Ub ligase F-box
